thread.title: Action heroine 'Lara Croft' arrives in London with European Premiere

title: Action heroine 'Lara Croft' arrives in London with European Premiere
text:
Action heroine 'Lara Croft' arrives in London with European Premiere 9:48am GMT - 01:47 
The latest ''Tomb Raider'' reboot which sees Alicia Vikander take over as action hero Lara Croft, premieres in London. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The latest "Tomb Raider" reboot which sees Alicia Vikander take over as action hero Lara Croft, premieres in London. Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2Iash24
